title: Epiq Adds Relativity and Arc Managed Services to Hong Kong Legal Technology Offerings
text:
Epiq Adds Relativity and Arc Managed Services to Hong Kong Legal Technology Offerings October 18, 2015 20:00 ET | Source: Epiq Systems, Inc. 
HONG KONG, Oct. 19, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Epiq Systems (NASDAQ: EPIQ ), a leading global provider of integrated technology solutions for the legal profession, today announced that kCura's Relativity ® — a best-in-class eDiscovery review platform — is now available through Epiq in Hong Kong. kCura's Relativity, which includes Relativity Analytics and Relativity Assisted Review, is available for individual matters and through Epiq's managed services platform, Arc SM . The Arc product gives users their own Relativity environment for a fixed monthly fee. 
"We are committed to seamlessly serving our clients worldwide," said Andrew Shimek, global managing director at Epiq Systems. "Expanding Epiq's Relativity footprint to Hong Kong is part of that commitment. It is our mission to deliver best-in-class eDiscovery wherever our clients are." 
With 61 Relativity Certified Administrators and 11 Relativity Analytics Specialists, Epiq offers a breadth of Relativity expertise. Worldwide, Epiq provides full-service eDiscovery, from local collection and processing through hosting and production. Epiq offers project-by-project, managed services and enterprise-level eDiscovery solutions, as well as local language document and audio review services. Epiq's global offices and data centers meet or exceed Tier III standards, ensuring secure, compliant cross-border data transactions and discovery outcomes. 
Epiq Systems has been operating in Hong Kong since 2009 and continues to expand across the globe. With offices in Hong Kong, Tokyo, the U.S., U.K., Canada, and most recently Germany, Epiq combines local knowledge and expertise with global reach. 
About Epiq Systems 
Epiq Systems (NASDAQ: EPIQ ) is a leading global provider of integrated technology solutions for the legal profession, including electronic discovery, bankruptcy, and class action and mass tort administration. We also offer full-service capabilities to support litigation, investigations, financial transactions, regulatory compliance and other legal matters. Our innovative technology and services, deep subject-matter expertise and global presence spanning 45 countries served from more than 30 locations allow us to provide secure, reliable solutions to the worldwide legal community. Visit us at www.epiqsystems.com .
